content: our skilled danish designers created this simple and pretty timeless shawl 1 we know this will be your new everlasting favourite the shawl 2 is worked in hobbii twister this yarn is a soft and fantastic cake yarn available in a wide range of beautiful colour combinations with long gradient colourways pick your favourite colour and leave it up to twister create your timeless shawl have fun **materials ** - hobbii twister - crochet hook 4 mm us size g/6 **measurements ** approx 170 x 66 cm **usage ** 1 ball twister 3 **abbreviations ** **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch / stitches **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet **rdcf** raised double_crochet front **rdcb** raised double_crochet back **chain-space** chain-space 1 https //hobbii com/timeless-shawl-twister utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=timeless-shawl-twister&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/hobbii-twister utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=twister&utm_term=swr
